name: Salaire annuel 1 (bas)
description: Salaire annuel pour un employé débutant tel qu'un assistant, un manageur, un coordinateur, un spécialiste en informatique, un agent des relations publiques ou un autre poste de débutant

name: Salaire annuel 2 (semestriel)
description: Salaire annuel pour un employé de niveau intermédiaire tel qu'un spécialiste en santé publique, un avocat ou un autre poste de niveau intermédiaire

name: Salaire annuel 3 (élevé)
description: Salaire annuel pour un employé de haut niveau tel qu'un directeur de la santé publique ou un autre poste de haut niveau

name: Honoraires de consultant (par jour)
description: Honoraires journaliers et per diem pour un consultant type afin de fournir des conseils et un soutien d'expert (par ex., examiner la législation, rédiger des plans, faciliter les exercices)

name: Voyage pour consultant
description: Frais de voyage par voyage pour un consultant type

name: Formateur / superviseur per diem avec repas
description: Per diem pour le formateur / superviseur qui inclut des repas pour assurer la formation et la supervision (par exemple, organiser des sessions de formation, vérifier les systèmes de surveillance, évaluer les rapports)

name: Téléphone mobile (par personne)
description: Coût d'un téléphone portable (par personne)
subheading_name: Téléphone mobile avec forfait de données mobiles

name: Forfait mobile et données (par personne)
description: Forfait de données mobiles pour téléphone portable (coût par personne)
subheading_name: Téléphone mobile avec forfait de données mobiles

name: Système informatique avec logiciel de bureau (par personne)
description: Système informatique avec logiciel de productivité de bureau standard (coût par personne)

name: Forfait connexion internet haut débit de bureau
description: Coût annuel pour l'accès Internet à haut débit par ordinateur (par bureau)

name: Petit travail d'impression
description: Coût par petit travail d'impression (10 - 200 pages)

name: Gros travail d'impression
description: Coût par gros travail d'impression (> 200 pages)

name: Réunion - Petite
description: Coût d'une petite réunion d'une journée complète, y compris les réunions qui sont des séances de formation ou des ateliers, en estimant 15 participants

name: Réunion - Moyenne
description: Coût pour tenir une réunion moyenne d'une journée entière, y compris les réunions qui sont des sessions de formation ou des ateliers, en estimant 30 participants

name: Réunion - Grande
description: Coût d'une grande réunion d'une journée entière, y compris les réunions qui sont des sessions de formation ou des ateliers, en estimant 85 participants

name: Per diem pour la réunion - Local
description: Per diem local pour les participants aux réunions (coût par personne)

name: Per diem pour la réunion - International
description: Per diem international pour les participants aux réunions (coût par personne)

name: Computer server system
description: Cost of a single computer server system

name: Computer server system annual maintenance
description: Annual maintenance fee for a single computer server system

name: Specialized computer software license
description: Annual fee for specialized commercial computer software (cost per license)

name: Annual lease costs for 1,000 sq. meter national stockpile storage facility
description: Annual leasing costs for national stockpile storage facility (cost per facility)

name: Purchase cost for 1,000 sq. meter national stockpile storage facility
description: Cost to purchase national stockpile storage facility (cost per facility)

name: Medical countermeasures stockpile kit
description: Medical countermeasures stockpile kit (cost per kit)

name: Delivery truck
description: Cost of a single delivery truck

name: Medical countermeasures stockpile contents management/inventory system
description: Medical countermeasures stockpile contents management/inventory system (cost per facility)

name: Vaccine
description: Approximate cost of single measles vaccine

name: Refrigeration equipment
description: Cost of a medium-sized laboratory refrigerator and cooler

name: Coût de bureau par mètre carré (à louer)
description: Coût de la location d'espace de bureau par mètre carré (les calculs de l'outil supposent une estimation de 8 mètres carrés par employé selon WHO-CHOICE)

name: Coût de bureau par mètre carré (à acheter)
description: Coût de l'achat d'espace de bureau par mètre carré (les calculs de l'outil supposent une estimation de 8 mètres carrés par employé selon WHO-CHOICE)

name: Office technology cost per occupant
description: Cost per occupant of shared office technology costs (e.g. fax machine, printer, landlines)

name: Office broadband internet and cellular data plan
description: Cost per office for shared office internet and cellular data plan

name: Laboratory construction cost
description: Cost to build a new laboratory (building only)

name: Radiation alarm
description: Cost of a radiation alarm

name: Geiger counter
description: Cost of a Geiger counter

name: Gate monitor
description: Cost of a gate monitor

name: Personal dosimeter
description: Cost a personal radiation dosimeter

name: Air quality sensor
description: Cost of a commercial air quality sensor

name: Mass spectrometer
description: Cost of a commercial mass spectrometer

name: Chemical information database annual subscription fee (6-10 users)
description: Cost of an annual subscription fee (per office)

name: Portable chemical detector/alarm systems
description: Cost for a personal chemical detector (per device)

name: Personal protective equipment (chemical)
description: Cost per suit for personal protective equipment (cover-all suit) for handling chemicals

name: Self-contained breathing apparatus
description: Cost of self-contained breathing apparatus for protection from fallout hazard (cost per apparatus)

name: Biometric lock system
description: Cost of a biometric lock system

name: Disinfection, decontamination, and vector control kits
description:
Cost ker kit, assumed to include: Sodium hypochlorite solution 4-6%; 5 L bottle 
Calcium hypochlorite powder; 70%, 40 kg
 LYSOL Disinfectant Cleaner; (5L)
Alpha-cypermethrin SC 10%; 
Permethrin EC (10% solution)
; Rodenticides: Brodifacoum (0.2 g/kg pellets)
; Rodenticides: Bromadiolone (0.005% block bait)
; Isopropyl alcohol solution; 70% 
Antiseptic Liquid Soap

name: Outbreak investigation kit
description: Cost per kit, assumed to include PPE and supplies for documentation, as well as supplies necessary to safely collect and transport samples

name: Vehicle - ambulance
description: Cost of a single ambulence equipped for patient transport

name: Vehicle maintenance - ambulance
description: Annual maintenance fee for a single ambulence equipped for patient transport

name: 5-day technical training course in software and systems
description: Cost of one-time technical training course

name: Landline telephone
description: Cost of landline telephone

name: Cost per three-minute local call
description: Cost of local three-minute call

name: Fax machine
description: Cost of a fax machine

name: Printer / Copier
description: Cost of a combined printer and copier

name: Annual stipend for community health worker
description: Cost of annual stipend for community health worker

name: Annual toll-free service plan
description: Cost of annual toll-free service plan

name: Rapid response kit
description: Cost of a rapid response kit, including consumables, PPE, and sample collection supplies.

name: Annual subscription to AMR core standards document
description: Cost of annual subscription to AMR core standards document

name: Airborne infection isolation room
description: Cost of a single airborne infection isolation room

name: Standard database software license
description: Cost of database software license (cost per liense)

name: National television airtime (per 1-minute message)
description: Cost of one minute national television airtime

name: National radio airtime (per 1-minute message)
description: Cost of one minute national radio airtime

name: 1/4-page advertisement in national newspaper (per day)
description: Cost of 1/4 page newspaper advertisement

name: Epidemiology training consumables
description: Cost of epidemiology training consumables (cost per person)

name: IT infrastructure and structural modifications for EOC
description: Cost of IT infrastructure (e.g., monitors, computers, teleconference systems) and minor structural modifications (e.g., infrastructure mounted on walls) necessary to support the EOC

name: Cooler with ice packs
description: Cost of a 24 quart cooler and two reusable ice pack

name: Microscopy and bacterial culture capability start-up costs
description: Start-up costs for lab infrastructure required for microscopy and bacterial culture, including incubators, colony counters, blood culture system, fluorescence microscope

name: Microscopy and bacterial culture capability annual upkeep costs
description: Recurring costs for ongoing microscopy and bacterial culture capabilities, including growth and selective media plates, microscope slides, and stains

name: Virus culture, serology, and PCR capability start-up costs
description: Start-up costs for lab infrastructure required for virus culture, serology, and PCR, including ABI 3500 Genetic Analyzer, thermocycler, and ELISA system

name: Virus culture, serology, and PCR capability annual upkeep costs
description: Recurring costs for ongoing virus culture, serology, and PCR capabilities, including PCR reagent kit, microcentrifuge tubes, ELISA reagents, and materials for virus culture

name: National laboratory facility start-up costs
description: Start-up costs for national laboratory facility, including water purification systems, industrial freezers, autoclaves, centrifuges, and other laboratory supply materials

name: National laboratory facility annual upkeep costs
description: Annual upkeep costs for national laboratory facility, including maintenance of equipment, gloves, shoe covers, and office materials

name: Malaria rapid diagnostic tests
description: Cost of single point-of-care test for malaria

name: Influenza rapid diagnostic tests
description: Cost of single point-of-care test for influenza

name: Cholera rapid diagnostic tests
description: Cost of single point-of-care test for cholera

name: Plague rapid diagnostic tests
description: Cost of single point-of-care test for plague

name: HIV/AIDS rapid diagnostic tests
description: Cost of single point-of-care test for HIV/AIDS

name: National vaccine coverage survey
description: National coverage survey system or system of administrative records to monitor and demonstrate vaccination rates, including personnel costs, travel costs, and materials costs (cost per survey)
